Grand Master Oltran:
You should be aware of the Forbidden Gates on the outpost of Aden. This place is now full of dark energy, due to the fact that the Goddess of Death drew his attention to the Gate. And new evil spirits Shilen waiting for an opportunity to attack Aden.
Our brave vanguard of Aden found in the dungeon lair of evil creatures and tried to destroy it. Braves were missing, and we were going to send them scouting party to help. It would be nice if you could take up the matter.
